name: NeoLib Javalike C++ Library
short_description: A C++ Library of Javalike standard type-wrapper classes (i.e. Integer, Float, Double, Decimal, Array, Hash, String, etc.) derived from a common Object class. The initial purpose is to provide an alternative to many circumstance where templates are require
